backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining CMS types, admin authentication with token management, and CRUD state for sections, products, gallery, messages, and settings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs for two deployment and reliability features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing authentication, routing, connectivity handling, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark CSS variables and global UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with sidebar navigation and logout handling that renders nested admin pages.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login form using username/password with error handling, loading states, and version label.
frontend/src/admin/AdminRoutes.tsx: Handles admin routing, session validation, actor initialization, and displays login, errors, or admin layout based on token and backend status.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminDelet: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with optional loading state.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminFormE: Displays a styled error alert for admin form validation or mutation errors.
frontend/src/admin/components/ImageStrin: Image upload/input component supporting file-to-base64 conversion, error handling, and preview.
frontend/src/admin/components/Initialize: Card that triggers sample content initialization with a confirmation dialog and progress state.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminAccount: React Query hooks for listing, adding, and deleting admin accounts with error normalization.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides login/logout mutations for admin authentication with token extraction and friendly error messages.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminContent: React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting sections and products using actor calls with timeout handling.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminPasswor: Provides a mutation hook for changing the admin password with validation and normalized error handling.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state by storing, retrieving, and clearing the admin token and session errors from sessionStorage.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminAccountsPa: UI for listing, creating, and deleting admin accounts with client-side validation and backend mutations.
Displays admin dashboard stats for sections, products, gallery items, and messages using multiple queries.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminNotFound.t: Renders a not-found page for invalid admin routes with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ChangePasswordP: Form page allowing an admin to change their password with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactInfoEdit: Editor page for viewing and updating contact information with validation and admin-authenticated mutations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/GalleryEditor.t: Interface for adding, editing, and deleting gallery items, including form validation and admin-protected mutations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MessagesInbox.t: Admin inbox page listing contact messages, supporting deletion with confirmation and handling loading/error states.
Admin UI for adding, editing, and deleting products with form validation, image upload, and mutation handling.
Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting page sections with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/SiteSettingsEdi: Form-based editor allowing admins to view and update site settings such as name and logo.
frontend/src/admin/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Modal that collects and saves a user's display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/admin/utils/adminAuthErrorM: Maps replica rejection details to user-friendly admin auth error messages and determines when to preserve tokens.
frontend/src/admin/utils/fileToImageStri: Utility converting image files to data URLs with type and size validation.
frontend/src/admin/utils/option.ts: Helper extracting string tokens from Motoko optional return structures.
frontend/src/admin/utils/replicaRejectio: Parses errors to extract replica rejection details including codes, messages, and flags for canister or connectivity issues.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router and public/admin routes with shared layouts and health gate.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: Displays a server connectivity error message with retry and diagnostics options, supporting compact and full layouts.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the site logo using settings data with a fallback image on error.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionLabe: Shows the build version and optionally a preview badge based on the release channel.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and message submission using a query hook.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Provides responsive navigation with links, logo, mobile menu, and optional authenticated logout.
frontend/src/components/PublicAppErrorBo: Catches application errors and displays a recovery UI with reload and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Exports reusable loading, error, empty, and skeleton UI components for query-driven views.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Shows the site footer with links, contact info, version label, and fallback error state on connectivity issues.
frontend/src/components/StartupHealthGat: Displays loading, retry, or error states while initializing the backend actor and health checks, rendering children only when ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Provides backend health checks with timeout, retry logic, and derived status values for connection handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and providing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Clears the Internet Identity session and wipes all cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as sections, products, gallery, settings, messages, and profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and custom CSS variables for themes, colors, and layout utilities.
frontend/src/layout/PublicLayout.tsx: Provides a public-facing page layout with header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Loads and displays 'About' sections from the backend with loading, error, and emptyâ€‘state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Fetches and displays contact info with fallback states and renders a contact form.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Shows backend and actor connection diagnostics with stored error retrieval and retry handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays a gallery grid with image dialogs and connectivity/error fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Fetches site settings and sections to render the homepage hero and feature content with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product cards with loading, empty, and connectivity error states.
frontend/src/pages/PublicNotFound.tsx: Simple 404 page offering navigation back to home or previous page.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Generates a build version string from environment variables with fallback logic.
frontend/src/utils/connectivityDiagnosti: Stores, retrieves, and clears the last connectivity error in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/queryTimeout.ts: Provides a timeout wrapper for async queries and utilities to detect and normalize connectivity-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/releaseChannel.ts: Determines whether the app is running in production or preview mode using environment variables and URL patterns.
frontend/src/utils/routerBasePath.ts: Computes the router base path from environment variables or preview-specific URL segments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including session-backed persistence and hash cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and animations with custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, issues, and feature requests including a rollback and connectivity improvements.
